title: BRIEF-Federal-Mogul Goetze (India) Says Workers Union At Bangalore Plant Called Off Tool Down Strike
text:
BRIEF-Federal-Mogul Goetze (India) Says Workers Union At Bangalore Plant Called Off Tool Down Strike

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 12:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Federal-Mogul Goetze (India) Says Workers Union At Bangalore Plant Called Off Tool Down Strike Oct 3 (Reuters) - Federal-Mogul Goetze (India) Ltd : * WORKERS UNION AT BANGALORE PLANT CALLED OFF TOOL DOWN STRIKE, WORKMEN RESUMED DUTIES
